long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swifty Sticky Note is a fast, secure, and straightforward extension designed for taking notes while browsing the web. It's all about speed and simplicity!

Your data is stored exclusively on your browser's local storage, ensuring privacy and security.

Side note: to enable or disable spell checker. Right-click on the sticky note --> Spellcheck --> Check the spelling for text fields.
